import React,{Component} from 'react' import "./Today.css" import SideBody from './sideBody/SideBody' import News from './news/News.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Today extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { latitude:"", longitude:"", searchByLL:"", id:"", city:"" } this.findCoordinates=this.findCoordinates.bind(this) } findCoordinates = () => { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( position => { const location = JSON.stringify(position.coords.latitude); this.setState({ location }); }, error => console.log(error.message), { enableHighAccuracy: true, timeout: 20000, maximumAge: 1000 } ); }; componentDidMount() { const tryin= this.state.longitude console.log(this.getLocation()) const dataLol= 'http://api.apixu.com/v1/current.json?key=82fe923258fa4530a5e235322192604&q=' + "Lima" axios.get(dataLol) .then(response => { this.setState({ data: response.data.location}); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } render () { {this.findCoordinates()} {console.log(this.state)} return(
